answer: While Europe does have per country operators there are some operators that will provide very low roaming rates. I've not tried any of them though and not all of them cover the whole of Europe yet. Be aware that some countries such as the UK have a very competitive Pay As You Go market with very cheap flexible sims available with bundled data etc while other countries such as France are a lot less competitive.

question.subtitle: Possible Duplicate What are the best ways to avoid data roaming fees when travelling abroad? Is where any default cheap mobile provider across Europe? I want to buy sim card in one country East or Nord Europe and use it in other West Europe . Is it possible?
question.title: Cheapest mobile operator in Europe
